Minutes

Test script: Eric sent a document around. After discussion we now know where we're heading. Eric to start the implementation.

DILS and ENFIN workshop were a success for the BioCatalogue. CASIMIR project are registering their service in the catalogue.

SKOS integration meeting with Simon. SKOS does better what we currently do with classification. in addition, If we plan to integrate our classification to other projects, SKOS seems the way to go.
